description.value: Maps DegreeOfCertainty codes as found in the Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) HypersensitivityIntolerance v1.0 (2024)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/HypersensitivityIntolerance-v1.0(2024EN)) to <http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/allergyintolerance-verification> as found in `AllergyIntolerance.verificationStatus` in FHIR R4.

comment.value: 'Suspected' is similar to 'Known possible', but implies a higher level of certainity. 'Unconfirmed' is a broader term that includes both 'Known possible' and 'Suspected'.
